segments.text: I'm watching two children near the kitchen cabinets, quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up, way up, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just make out the label 'COOKIE JAR' inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already in the jar, pulling out forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands below, her arm raised expectantly towards him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, it's endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The joy of those forbidden cookies must be absolutely immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together quite well as a team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, really, playing out before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are masters of stealth and timing, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR
